column1: When the hubbub downstairs started the four Rover boys were up in their adjoining bedrooms partly undressed and in the midst of a couple of impromptu boxing matches
column2: one taking place between Andy and Jack and the other between Randy and Fred."There
column4: how do you like that?" cried Andy
column7: he managed to land a slapping blow on Jack's bare shoulder."Fine
column8: child! fine!" retorted young Jack. "But not half as good as this
column9: he continued, and, with a sudden spring, he landed one blow on Andy's chest and another on his shoulder which sent Tom's son staggering half-way across the bed.Hurrah! one man down! Now for the next!" cried Fred
column10: and managed to land several blows in quick succession on Randy's shoulder.But then the fun-loving twin came at him with a rush
column11: sending him into a corner and on to a little table containing a number of books. As Fred went down the table did likewise and the books fell all over him.
